curam.util.security

Interface AuthenticationBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Authentication, AuthenticationLocal

    public interface AuthenticationBase
    The base interface for server side remote and local interfaces to extend.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String kExternalUserType
      The external user identifier.
      static java.lang.String kInternalUserType
      The internal user identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        java.security.Principal login(java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException,
                              java.rmi.RemoteException
        Login a user. The user type is by default an internal user.
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name.
        password - The password.
        Returns:
        A principal to represent the authenticated user.
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException - if authentication fails.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the authentication server is unavailable or cannot be reached.

      • login

        java.security.Principal login(java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.String userType)
                       throws javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException,
                              java.rmi.RemoteException
        Login a user.
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name.
        password - The password.
        userType - The type of user, for internal users this is INTERNAL.
        Returns:
        A principal to represent the authenticated user.
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException - if authentication fails.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the authentication server is unavailable or cannot be reached.

      • login

        java.security.Principal login(java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.String userType,
                              boolean identityOnly)
                       throws javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException,
                              java.rmi.RemoteException
        Login a user.
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name.
        password - The password.
        userType - The type of user, for internal users this is INTERNAL.
        identityOnly - True if only the identity should be checked.
        Returns:
        A principal to represent the authenticated user.
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException - if authentication fails.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the authentication server is unavailable or cannot be reached.

      • logout

        boolean logout()
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Logout the user.
        Returns:
        True when logout is successful.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the authentication server is unavailable or can't be reached
